Librarian checks and approves the book
Book is being prepared for collection

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Ask the librarian to retrieve the requested book
Send email to requestor confirming their book has been reserved

sys_variable_value.value: The book you requested from Hogwarts library is available

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛First nameTrigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Last name,

 

Thank you for your request

Please collect your book from Hogwarts Library.

If you would prefer to have it delivered, then please fill in the request form to use our delivery service (Owl Post).

 

Best Regards,

Your Librarians.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Librarian will retrieve the book from the library

sys_variable_value.value: Retrieve the book from the library

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send email to requestor informing them that the book is not available

sys_variable_value.value: The book you requested is not currently available

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛First nameTrigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Last name,

The book is not currently available.
We will inform you when it becomes available again

Please check our library collection for other books that may be of interest to you.
